word: To His disciples Christ said, "Ye are the salt of the earth: but if the salt have lost his savor, . . . it is thenceforth good for nothing, but to be cast out, and to be trodden under foot of men." How careful then we should be to follow the example of Christ in our lifework. Unless we do this, we are worthless to the world--salt which has lost its savor. . . .
